languages.title: JavaScript
languages.description: A high-level, dynamic language primarily used for web development on both client and server sides, supporting event-driven, functional, and object-oriented programming.

languages.title: Python
languages.description: A versatile, high-level language known for readability and ease of use, widely used in web development, data science, automation, and AI, supporting procedural, OOP, and functional programming.

languages.title: C++
languages.description: A powerful, multi-paradigm language supporting procedural, object-oriented, and generic programming, commonly used for system software, games, and performance-critical applications.

languages.title: Lua
languages.description: A lightweight, embeddable language known for its simplicity and ease of use, commonly used for game development, scripting, and configuration files.
